formatDescription: This is an outline record only, and requires further details, research or authentication to provide information that will enable users to further understand the format and to assess digital preservation risks associated with it if appropriate. If you are able to help by supplying any additional information concerning this entry, please return to the main PRONOM page and select ‘Add an Entry’.
provenanceCompoundName: Digital Preservation Department / The National Archives
formatProvenance: 08/2023 (v.113)- Max-offset added to BOF signature to accommodate header bytes. Submitted by The National Library of Australia.

internalSignatures.name: Log ASCII Standard 1.2
internalSignatures.note: Header ASCII: ~V followed by version and standard information (VERS. 1.2 CWLS (LOG ASCII STANDARD||Log ASCII standard|LAS) V(ERSION|ersion) 1.2) and then mandatory logging data recorded in Well Information Section (~W), Curve Information section (~C), and ASCII Log Data section (~A).696F6E)20312E32*7E57*7E43*7E41
